thread.title: Look 'Scandalous' on a working woman's budget
thread.title_full: Look 'Scandalous' on a working woman's budget

title: Look 'Scandalous' on a working woman's budget
text:
Look 'Scandalous' on a working woman's budget Kelly Swoope 11:47 PM, Oct 15, 2015 9 mins ago Finding the Oliva Pope look for less WMAR Previous Next 
From the newsroom to the anchor desk, Ashley James and Kelly Swoope love to bust a move and strut the celebrity style like "Scandal's" Olivia Pope. But with Ashley James saving for a wedding and Kelly Swoope paying her daughter's tuition, not much money is left for the wardrobe budget. 
Like many of you, we don't have the wide open wallet like Olivia Pope But what if you could have the handbag she puts that wallet in? 
Fashion Blogger Kim West says it’s out there with your name on it just waiting for you to carry it away. 
And if you shop around, that’s not all you can find. West says you can have that chic style too on a budget....just check out the look west came up with from Ann Taylor’s sale rack for Ashley.
